20101211060505.333|20101211060507.000|CCO|>> THE SIZE AND SCOPE OF THIS 
20101211060507.000|20101211060508.667|CCO|THING WAS WAY BEYOND I THINK 
20101211060508.667|20101211060510.333|CCO|WHAT ANY OF US IMAGINED IT WOULD

20101211060514.500|20101211060517.000|CCO|COVERED THE EQUIVALENT OF 75 
20101211060517.000|20101211060519.500|CCO|FOOTBALL FIELDS.

20101211060523.667|20101211060525.333|CCO|DRY STREAM BED WHERE SOME OF THE

20101211060542.000|20101211060544.000|CCO|EARLY IN THE EXCAVATION, ONE 
20101211060544.000|20101211060546.000|CCO|INVESTIGATOR WATCHED AS AN EARTH

20101211060550.000|20101211060552.000|CCO|SKULL ROLL DOWN THE HILL AND 
20101211060552.000|20101211060554.000|CCO|STOP AT HIS FEET.
20101211060554.000|20101211060556.000|CCO|IT WAS AN EYE-OPENER THAT TAUGHT
20101211060556.000|20101211060558.000|CCO|EVERYONE FROM SEASONED CRIMINAL 
20101211060558.000|20101211060600.000|CCO|INVESTIGATOR TO BACKHOE OPERATOR
20101211060600.000|20101211060602.000|CCO|TO TREAD LIGHTLY.

20101211060643.429|20101211061031.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20101211060643.429|20101211060644.857|CCO|  ONE OPTION YOUR DOCTOR MAY
20101211060644.857|20101211060646.286|CCO|  CONSIDER IS ADDING ABILIFY.
20101211060646.286|20101211060647.714|CCO|   ABILIFY TREATS DEPRESSION
20101211060647.714|20101211060649.143|CCO|           IN ADULTS
20101211060649.143|20101211060650.571|CCO|           WHEN ADDED
20101211060650.571|20101211060652.000|CCO|     TO AN ANTIDEPRESSANT.
20101211060652.000|20101211060653.250|CCO|          SOME PEOPLE
20101211060653.250|20101211060654.500|CCO|    HAD SYMPTOM IMPROVEMENT
20101211060654.500|20101211060655.750|CCO|IN AS EARLY AS ONE TO TWO WEEKS
20101211060655.750|20101211060657.000|CCO|     AFTER ADDING ABILIFY.
20101211060657.000|20101211060658.250|CCO|            NOW WITH
20101211060658.250|20101211060659.500|CCO|   THE ABILIFY (ME+) PROGRAM,
20101211060659.500|20101211060700.750|CCO|YOUR FIRST TWO WEEKS OF ABILIFY
20101211060700.750|20101211060702.000|CCO|          CAN BE FREE.
20101211060702.000|20101211060703.000|CCO|  ABILIFY IS NOT FOR EVERYONE.
20101211060703.000|20101211060704.000|CCO|        CALL YOUR DOCTOR
20101211060704.000|20101211060705.000|CCO|   IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS
20101211060705.000|20101211060706.000|CCO|  OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES
20101211060706.000|20101211060707.000|CCO|          IN BEHAVIOR,
20101211060707.000|20101211060708.000|CCO|    OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.
20101211060708.000|20101211060709.000|CCO|        ANTIDEPRESSANTS
20101211060709.000|20101211060710.000|CCO|       CAN INCREASE THESE
20101211060710.000|20101211060711.000|CCO|       IN CHILDREN, TEENS
20101211060711.000|20101211060712.000|CCO|       AND YOUNG ADULTS.
20101211060712.000|20101211060713.111|CCO|   ELDERLY DEMENTIA PATIENTS
20101211060713.111|20101211060714.222|CCO|         TAKING ABILIFY
20101211060714.222|20101211060715.333|CCO|     HAVE AN INCREASED RISK
20101211060715.333|20101211060716.444|CCO|      OF DEATH OR STROKE.
20101211060716.444|20101211060717.556|CCO|        CALL YOUR DOCTOR
20101211060717.556|20101211060718.667|CCO|    IF YOU HAVE HIGH FEVER,
20101211060718.667|20101211060719.778|CCO|  STIFF MUSCLES AND CONFUSION
20101211060719.778|20101211060720.889|CCO|     TO ADDRESS A POSSIBLE
20101211060720.889|20101211060722.000|CCO|  LIFE-THREATENING CONDITION.
20101211060722.000|20101211060723.000|CCO| OR IF YOU HAVE UNCONTROLLABLE
20101211060723.000|20101211060724.000|CCO|       MUSCLE MOVEMENTS,
20101211060724.000|20101211060725.000|CCO|            AS THESE
20101211060725.000|20101211060726.000|CCO|    COULD BECOME PERMANENT.
20101211060726.000|20101211060727.000|CCO|       HIGH BLOOD SUGAR
20101211060727.000|20101211060728.000|CCO|       HAS BEEN REPORTED
20101211060728.000|20101211060729.000|CCO|          WITH ABILIFY
20101211060729.000|20101211060730.000|CCO|     AND MEDICINES LIKE IT.
20101211060730.000|20101211060731.000|CCO|         IN SOME CASES,
20101211060731.000|20101211060732.000|CCO|    EXTREME HIGH BLOOD SUGAR
20101211060732.000|20101211060733.250|CCO|   CAN LEAD TO COMA OR DEATH.
20101211060733.250|20101211060734.500|CCO| OTHER RISKS INCLUDE DECREASES
20101211060734.500|20101211060735.750|CCO|     IN WHITE BLOOD CELLS,
20101211060735.750|20101211060737.000|CCO|     WHICH CAN BE SERIOUS,
20101211060737.000|20101211060738.250|CCO|    DIZZINESS UPON STANDING,
20101211060738.250|20101211060739.500|CCO| SEIZURES, TROUBLE SWALLOWING,
20101211060739.500|20101211060740.750|CCO|     AND IMPAIRED JUDGMENT
